author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
A few months back there was a discussion about increasing the dependence on Systemd within the GNOME project and now that this has come into play, the distros without systemd have to make some changes.

title: GNOME's Future On Systemd-less Linux Distros
